    • Method Detail

      • followLink

        void followLink()
        Actual for <a href> elements. Navigates browser by clicking this links.

      • setValue

        SelenideElement setValue(java.lang.String text)
        Clear the text field and enter given text. Implementation details: This is the same as 
           1. WebElement.clear()
   2. WebElement.sendKeys(text)
        Parameters:
        text - Any text to enter into the text field.

      • val

        SelenideElement val(java.lang.String text)
        Same as #type(java.lang.String)

      • append

        SelenideElement append(java.lang.String text)
        Append given test to the text field Implementation details: This is the same as 
          WebElement.sendKeys(text)
        Parameters:
        text - Any text to append into the text field.

      • pressEnter

        SelenideElement pressEnter()
        Press ENTER. Useful for input field and textareas: 
          $("query").val("Aikido techniques").pressEnter();
        Implementation details: This is the same as 
          WebElement.sendKeys(Keys.ENTER)

      • text

        java.lang.String text()

      • val

        java.lang.String val()
        Get the "value" attribute of the element
        Returns:
        attribute "value" value or empty string if attribute is missing

      • getSelectedOption

        SelenideElement getSelectedOption()
        Find selected option from this select field
        Returns:
        WebElement for selected <option> element
        Throws:
        org.openqa.selenium.NoSuchElementException - if no options are selected
